content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to activate the arcgis environment using different paths for conda.sh and activate, but received an error message stating "No such file or directory". I then tried multiple commands to activate the environment, but all resulted in the same error message.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "bash -c \'source /home/katmai/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate arcgis && python -c \\"import arcgis; print(arcgis.__version__)\\"\'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'bash: line 1: /home/katmai/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh: No such file or directory\\n'", type='action_result')]
"""
